https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mzvz2V85Ohx9QcV5JsG6Shm83D0.jpg A filmmaker finds creative freedom more elusive than he imagined in this ironic comedy-drama. Tired of the state-appointed producers and censorship in his homeland, Soviet Georgia, Niko decides to move to France, only to find that he has merely traded one type of interference for another. Chantrapas
